episode_event_general_newyear_2021/6801_: I wonder what this new year will bring.

I hope we meet lots of new people and have a
ton of new experiences!
episode_event_general_newyear_2021/6901_:
Right now, traditional outfits from Johto are in
fashion here on Pasio!

There are many Trainers here from regions far
from Johto. This must be pretty new for them.

It’s really changed the look of Pasio lately. When
I’m out and about, I feel like I’m back home!

These traditional outfits come in a bunch of
different styles, but this design is the best for
celebrating the new year!
It wasn’t easy to put on, but I did my best!

I also decided to mix things up and sport a new
look for the occasion. Check out the Gyarados
design on my outfit. Doesn’t it look powerful?

Speaking of designs, I’ve been seeing lots of cards
around town with pictures of Pokémon on them!

People send these kinds of cards to their friends
and loved ones to celebrate the new year!

That’s right. It looks like this year’s cards have
designs inspired by the Johto region.

If you’re interested, why don’t we go into town to
see the cards?

Sure! [Name:PlayerNickname ], why don’t you
join us, too!
